tasks.task: Fill fuel container for riding mower
Transport fuel container to riding mower
subtasks: Walk from current location to riding mower
Lower fuel container onto ground near mower
Connect fuel hose to mower's fuel system
Pour fuel from container into hose
Detach fuel hose and replace fuel cap

tasks.task: Deliver fuel to riding mower for maintenance
subtasks: Drive to storage area to collect fuel container

tasks.task: Check riding mower's fuel level during operation
subtasks: Observe fuel gauge or attempt to locate fuel cap during use
